game.name: Final Vendetta
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Final Vendetta는 고전 아케이드 게임의 비주얼에 강한 액션으로 가득한 진행형 격투 게임입니다. 멋진 픽셀 아트와 Utah Saints의 독점 트랙이 함께하는 가슴을 울리는 사운드트랙을 체험하세요! 악당과 싸우며 위험한 장소를 통과하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A hard-hitting action packed beat ‘em up in the vein of classic arcade titles. Featuring stunning pixel art and a thumping soundtrack with exclusive tracks from Utah Saints! Brawl with bad dudes and tough girls as you fight through dangerous environments.

reviewHighlights.text: It's fine. Native Linux support is decent.
Wanted to like this, but it's just too janky to be enjoyable.
